document_data.mainbody: '''Croamarkh''' was the title used for elected mayors of the city of [[Westgate]] on the [[Dragon Coast]].
document_data.Activities: The position of Croamarkh was elected by a council of influential wealthy merchant families in Westgate. An election for this position was held every four years.
document_data.History: Croamarkhs ruled Westgate for over a century when King [[Dalious Croam|Dalious the "Errant King"]] abdicated the throne in the {{YearlinkName|137}}.
document_data.Known Croamarkhs: * [[Luer Dhostar]] was Croamarkh as of [[1358 DR]].
